summary: Completed Phase 1 UI redesign testing. Landing page loads with new premium design, dark mode default, Outfit/Manrope typography, framer-motion animations. Theme toggle works correctly. Protected routes (Dashboard, Journey) properly redirect unauthenticated users to landing page. All interactive elements have data-testid attributes.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with new premium UI design
Dark mode is the default theme
Theme toggle (dark/light) works correctly
New typography visible - Outfit for headings, Manrope for body
Hero section displays correctly with chess background image
4 feature cards render correctly with icons
Stats section (24/7, 100%, âˆž) displays correctly
Footer renders correctly
All CTA buttons have data-testid attributes
Theme toggle button has data-testid='theme-toggle'
Login button has data-testid='login-button'
Hero CTA has data-testid='hero-cta-button'
Learn More button scrolls to features section
Mobile landing page renders correctly (390x844 viewport)
Protected routes redirect unauthenticated users to landing page
Dashboard.jsx has data-testid='dashboard-page'
Journey.jsx has data-testid='journey-page'
Layout.jsx has navigation data-testid attributes (nav-dashboard, nav-journey, nav-import, nav-challenge)
Layout.jsx has header-theme-toggle, user-menu-trigger, mobile-menu-toggle data-testid
premium.jsx components have data-testid (progress-ring, status-badge-*, trend-*, stat-card, coach-message)
Framer-motion animations implemented in Dashboard, Journey, Layout, and premium components
ESLint passes for Dashboard.jsx, Journey.jsx, Layout.jsx
critical_code_review_comments: All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Framer-motion animations are properly implemented with AnimatePresence for mobile menu
Theme context properly persists theme to localStorage
Protected routes correctly check authentication and redirect
Font imports are properly configured in index.css and tailwind.config.js

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All UI elements render correctly, theme toggle works, animations present

seed_data_creation: None required - testing unauthenticated UI flows
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 1 UI redesign is complete and working. Landing page has premium design with dark mode default, Outfit/Manrope fonts, framer-motion animations. Protected routes (Dashboard, Journey, Import, Challenge, Settings) require Google OAuth login. To test authenticated pages, complete Google OAuth flow. All data-testid attributes are in place for automated testing. Mobile navigation menu is in Layout.jsx with mobile-menu-toggle and mobile-nav-* data-testid attributes.

verified_features.outfit_font_headings: Yes - configured in index.css and tailwind.config.js
verified_features.manrope_font_body: Yes - configured in index.css and tailwind.config.js
verified_features.framer_motion_animations: Yes - used in Dashboard, Journey, Layout, premium components
verified_features.data_testid_attributes: Yes - all interactive elements have data-testid
verified_features.protected_routes_redirect: Yes - unauthenticated users redirected to landing
verified_features.mobile_responsive: Yes - landing page renders correctly on mobile viewport
